app.title: Racana - Racing Analysis Tool
app.welcomeDescription: Please select or enter video sources below to start analysis. You can load local video files or enter YouTube URLs.
app.supportedFormats: Supported video formats: MP4, WebM, OGG, AVI, MOV, WMV
app.youCanAlsoEnter: You can also enter YouTube URLs or local file paths

video.enterLocalPathOrYouTube: Enter local file path or YouTube URL

markers.syncJumpToMarker: Jump to marker time points on both left and right sides simultaneously

help.title: User Guide
help.reportDescription: If you encounter any issues during use or have feature suggestions, please report them to us via GitHub Issues!

features.localAndYouTube: Support for local video files and YouTube video loading
features.syncOrIndependent: Left and right videos can be controlled synchronously or independently
features.frameControl: Precise frame-by-frame control for detailed action analysis
features.markerSystem: Marker system for marking important time points and quick navigation
features.visualTimeline: Visual timeline showing playback progress and marker positions
features.longPressJump: Support for long-press quick jump with stepped fast-forward functionality

errors.invalidVideoFormat: Please select a valid video file format (MP4, WebM, OGG, AVI, MOV, WMV, MKV, 3GP)
